Monterosa | Digital Product Designer, Digital Producer | ONSITE | Full-time | LONDON

Monterosa is a digital product company that creates second-screen experience apps for brands in TV and Sports industries (ITV, UEFA and more). Check our case studies on the website http://www.monterosa.co.

Monterosa is seeking for talented and creative people that love entertainment and sport, who want to help define the future of how fans interact with their passions. In return we offer competitive salaries with a fun, focussed, and challenging place to work, to meet new people and learn new things.

Feel free to email andrey@monterosa.co.uk.
